text: Ke kaloku wena (Muhammad) bacengcelezele ibali loonyana ababini baka-Adam, Ngamnye kubo wanikela idini (kuAllâh), lamkelwa elomnye kodwa elomnye alamkelwa. Waza lo lingamkelwanga elakhe wathi kulo lamkelweyo elakhe, “Mna, inene ndiya kukubulala.” Wathi omnye: “Inene uAllâh wamkela kuphela kwabo bamoyikayo Yena”
